General.Name: Gulf General Cooperative Insurance
General.Description: Gulf General Cooperative Insurance Company provides various insurance products for corporates and individuals in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Medical, Motor, Property, Engineering, Marine, and Accident and Liability segments. It offers marine cargo and hull, healthcare and life, personal accident, third-party and public liability, fidelity guarantee, and travel insurance products. Gulf General Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jeddah, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Al Gheithy Plaza, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia
